description: A comprehensive PostgreSQL startup and configuration script that initializes the database, checks for existing instances, sets up users and permissions, and saves connection configurations.

methods.name: pg_isready
methods.description: Checks if PostgreSQL server is ready on the specified port.

methods.name: psql
methods.description: Client connection tool to execute commands on PostgreSQL database.

methods.name: initdb
methods.description: Initializes a new PostgreSQL data directory.
